row.label: ${lbl:b_joined}@{select smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural_id as id, smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_nombres || ' ' || smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_apellidos as item from smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural order by smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_descripcion}

${lbl:b_module}@{select smn_base.smn_modulos.smn_modulos_id as id, smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_modulos order by smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre}

${lbl:b_joined}@{select smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural_id as id, smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_nombres || ' ' || smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_apellidos as item from smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural order by smn_base.smn_auxiliar_persona_natural.ant_descripcion}

${lbl:b_module}@{select smn_base.smn_modulos.smn_modulos_id as id, smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_modulos order by smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre}

${lbl:b_relationship}@{select smn_base.smn_parentezco.smn_parentezco_id as id, smn_base.smn_parentezco.ptz_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_parentezco.ptz_descripcion as item from smn_base.smn_parentezco order by smn_base.smn_parentezco.ptz_descripcion}
